content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ have you been afraid to try crochet socks well put that fear aside because i m going to walk you through the felici crochet socks free beginner pattern keep on reading for the pattern and also a video tutorial to walk you through each step **crochet hook ** size us g+ 4 5 mm crochet hook 1 **notions ** removable stitch markers if needed yarn needle to weave in ends scissors **yarn ** we crochet special reserve felici 2 in colorway time traveler worsted 4 weight yarn 75% merino 25% nylon 218yds/199m/100g **yardage ** small 260 yds 238m medium 280 yds 256m large 300 yds 274m 2 balls needed **abbreviations/stitches ** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet two together sc3tog - single_crochet three together slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch es **gauge** 18 5 sts and 19 row = 4x4 10 cm in single_crochet **measurements/sizes ** s us shoe size 4-7 m us shoe size 7-9 l us shoe size 9-11 **skill level ** easy the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www brianakdesigns com/ 3 let s be friends on social media
